title: Hong Kong passed a law making it easier to create new land through reclamation in the city's famed Victoria Harbour despite objections from environmental activists | National News | kpvi.com
text:
Hong Kong passed a law making it easier to create new land through reclamation in the city's famed Victoria Harbour despite objections from environmental activists
- Mladen ANTONOV
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Hong Kong passed a law on Wednesday that made it easier for the government to create new land through reclamation in the city's famed Victoria Harbour despite objections from environmental activists.
